app.libraries package¶

Submodules¶

app.libraries.collection_library module¶

class app.libraries.collection_library.CollectionLibrary(session, cache)[source]¶

Bases: object

async create_thumbnail(collection_id: int)[source]¶

Generates a new thumbnail for a collection by selecting first two documents with existing thumbnails, merging their images into a single composite, and saving the result as the collection’s new encrypted thumbnail. If the collection already has a thumbnail, it is removed before updating. The method uses an LRU cache to optimize thumbnail loading and ensures the merged image meets configured dimensions and quality settings.
